import './App.css'; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import logo from './simplifeye_logo.png' function App() { const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm(); const onSubmit = inputs => { const data = { type: inputs.Account_Type, country: inputs.Country, email: inputs.Email, business_type: inputs.Business_Type, capabilities: { card_payments: {requested: true}, transfers: {requested: true}, }, } fetch("/info",{ method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(data), }).then((res) => res.json()).then((data) => alert("The account id is: " + data)) } return (

); } export default App;
